    • Uses of TextCharacter in com.googlecode.lanterna.screen

      Fields in com.googlecode.lanterna.screen declared as TextCharacter 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static TextCharacter Screen.DEFAULT_CHARACTER
      This is the character Screen implementations should use as a filler is there are areas not set to any particular character.
